divs: Sighting DetailsRound with flat grey bottom, donut shape with lights coming out of it separated by some sort off ribs, moved almost hovering, covered great distance, got dimmer while I was watching then it disappeared. Five of us saw it.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Garden City
There were no other sightings in Garden City on or around August 24th 2012
Summary: Round with flat grey bottom, donut shape with lights coming out of it separated by some sort off ribs, moved almost hovering, covered great distance, got dimmer while I was watching
